Trade/Device Name(s): Kurin Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology, Push-Button Needle
Regulation Name(s): Tubes, Vials, Systems, Serum Separators, Blood Collection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Kurin Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology, Push-Button Needle for sterile, single-use blood sample collection and needlestick injury prevention.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for venipuncture to obtain blood samples with a safety shield to aid prevention of needlestick injury and includes a holder for connection to vacuum-based collection vials.
